name: Config 2022 Name Badge - Guilherme Souza
description:
I am a results-oriented person, used to working at a strategic level being flexible and hands-on with several teams across the company to pursue the best version of a product for its users. With a Product, Agile, Design, and Technology background, I already built multidisciplinary teams from scratch to design and build new digital solutions with exceptional client delivery. The best way I have found to achieve that is by relying on a diverse team and promoting a rich environment based on customer empathy, creativity, business design, and technology.
